name: WooCommerce add shipping address to addressbook
author: Vaibhav Sharma

sections.description:
Description

Creates a address book table and add shipping address of the logged in user.

This simple extension allows you to add shipping address to addressbook table.

Installation

  1. Unzip into your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

    Changelog

0.1 – 25/07/2013
* Initial release!
